name: header-analyzer
description: AI Bot Request Header Analyzer - Track and analyze HTTP headers from various AI bots

scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.check:all: npm run test && npm run lint:hardcore && npm run typecheck:hardcore && ./check-file-sizes.sh
scripts.lint:hardcore: eslint *.js renderers/*.js tests/*.js --config eslint.config.hardcore.js --max-warnings 0 --ignore-pattern node_modules --ignore-pattern .wrangler --ignore-pattern dist
scripts.predeploy: npm run check:all || (echo '❌ DEPLOYMENT BLOCKED - Fix all issues!' && exit 1)
scripts.deploy: npm run check:all && wrangler deploy || (echo '❌ CANNOT DEPLOY - Tests/Lint/TS/FileSize checks failed!' && exit 1)
scripts.test:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e

author: Franz AI
